content:
üìö Study Material - Exercise Vayushakti, Nagaland Conservation & Budget 2026

This study material covers critical defense exercises, wildlife conservation efforts, and recent economic updates relevant to upcoming government exams.

üöÄ Defense & Strategic Updates:

  • Exercise Vayushakti-26: A major domestic firepower demonstration conducted by the Indian Air Force at the Pokhran range in Jaisalmer, Rajasthan [cite: 1, 3, 4][cite_start].
  • Joint Military Exercises: India strengthens defense cooperation through exercises like 'Exercise Shakti' (with France) and 'Exercise Yudh Abhyas' (with the USA) [cite: 5, 6, 8][cite_start].
  • Nuclear History: Pokhran is historically significant as the site of India's first nuclear test in 1974 (Smiling Buddha) and the second in 1998 (Operation Shakti) [cite: 3][cite_start].

üêò Wildlife & Regional Geography:

  • The Sangtam Resolution: A community-led initiative in Nagaland specifically aimed at boosting the protection of the Pangolin [cite: 11, 12][cite_start].
  • Nagaland Heritage: A North-eastern state with its capital at Kohima, world-famous for the Hornbill Festival and vibrant tribal culture [cite: 13, 14, 15][cite_start].
  • Geographic Note: Contrary to desert landscapes, Nagaland is characterized by its hilly terrain and significant rainfall [cite: 16][cite_start].

üí∞ Infrastructure & Economy 2026:

  • Wular Barrage Project: A significant water infrastructure project located on the Jhelum River in Jammu and Kashmir [cite: 18, 19][cite_start].
  • Asian Rifle/Pistol Championship 2026: India showcased its sporting dominance by winning a total of 94 medals [cite: 20, 21][cite_start].
  • Rajasthan Budget 2026-27: The state's total budgetary outlay for the 2026-27 fiscal year is approximately ‚Çπ6.11 lakh crore.

Important Topics for Exams:

  • Major Military Exercises (Domestic vs Bilateral) [cite: 5][cite_start]
  • Northeastern States: Capitals, Festivals, and Conservation Acts [cite: 11, 14, 15][cite_start]
  • Indian River Systems and Major Dam/Barrage Projects [cite: 18]
  • Current State Budgets and Economic Indicators 2026

questions.rationale: ‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§â‡§™‡§Æ‡•Å‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§§ ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§¶‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•Å‡§§ ‡§¨‡§ú‡§ü 2026-27 ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Å‡§≤ ‡§Ü‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‚Çπ6.11 ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ñ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ã‡§°‡§º (‡§∏‡§ü‡•Ä‡§ï ‚Çπ6,10,956 ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ã‡§°‡§º) ‡§π‡•à‡•§ (The total size of the Rajasthan Budget 2026-27 presented by Deputy CM and Finance Minister Diya Kumari is ‚Çπ6.11 lakh crore, specifically ‚Çπ6,10,956 crore.)

questions.q: ‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§µ‡§æ‡§Ø‡•Å ‡§∏‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ '‡§µ‡§æ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§∂‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø-26' ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§® ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡§ó‡§æ? (Exercise Vayushakti-26 will be conducted by the Indian Air Force at which location?)
questions.rationale: ‡§µ‡§æ‡§Ø‡•Å‡§∂‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø-26 ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§µ‡§æ‡§Ø‡•Å ‡§∏‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§¶‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§® ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ã‡§ñ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§è‡§ó‡§æ‡•§ ‡§Ø‡§π ‡§è‡§ï ‡§ò‡§∞‡•á‡§≤‡•Ç ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§ø‡§∏‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§æ‡§Ø‡•Å ‡§∏‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∂‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§¶‡§∞‡•ç‡§∂‡§® ‡§ï‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ (Exercise Vayushakti-26 is a domestic exercise conducted by the Indian Air Force at the Pokhran range in Rajasthan to demonstrate its firepower.)

‡§ï‡§•‡§® 1, 2 ‡§î‡§∞ 3 ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ ‡§ï‡§•‡§® 4 ‡§ó‡§≤‡§§ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§≠‡§æ‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä‡§Ø ‡§∏‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§¶‡•á‡§∂‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§§‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•á‡§∂‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§∏‡•à‡§®‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ (Statements 1, 2, and 3 are correct. Statement 4 is incorrect as military exercises are also conducted outside India's borders in partner nations.)

questions.q: ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ó‡§§‡§Æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§µ (Sangtam Resolution) ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§â‡§¶‡•ç‡§¶‡•á‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§®‡§æ‡§ó‡§æ‡§≤‡•à‡§Ç‡§° ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§µ‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§£ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§µ‡§æ ‡§¶‡•á‡§®‡§æ ‡§π‡•à? (The Sangtam Resolution is aimed at boosting the protection of which animal in Nagaland?)

questions.rationale: ‡§ï‡§•‡§® 1, 2 ‡§î‡§∞ 3 ‡§∏‡§π‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§ ‡§ï‡§•‡§® 4 ‡§ó‡§≤‡§§ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç‡§ï‡§ø ‡§®‡§æ‡§ó‡§æ‡§≤‡•à‡§Ç‡§° ‡§è‡§ï ‡§™‡§π‡§æ‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§®‡§æ‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡§æ‡§¶‡§ø‡§§ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ö‡•Å‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ ‡§π‡•ã‡§§‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ (Statements 1, 2, and 3 are correct. Statement 4 is incorrect as Nagaland is a hilly, forested state with significant rainfall, not a desert.)

questions.q: ‡§π‡§æ‡§≤ ‡§π‡•Ä ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ñ‡§¨‡§∞‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§∞‡§π‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•Å‡§≤‡§∞ ‡§¨‡•à‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏ ‡§®‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•à? (The Wular Barrage Project, recently in news, is located on which river?)
questions.rationale: ‡§µ‡•Å‡§≤‡§∞ ‡§¨‡•à‡§∞‡§æ‡§ú ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ (‡§§‡•Å‡§≤‡§¨‡•Å‡§≤ ‡§™‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§ú‡§®‡§æ) ‡§ú‡§Æ‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ç ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§ï‡§∂‡•ç‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ù‡•á‡§≤‡§Æ ‡§®‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§µ‡•Å‡§≤‡§∞ ‡§ù‡•Ä‡§≤ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§π‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§ ‡§π‡•à‡•§ (The Wular Barrage project is located on the Jhelum River at the mouth of the Wular Lake in Jammu and Kashmir.)
